Peter Farrow

Salt Lake City, UT 84115 · (804) 840-8219 · pnfarrow@gmail.com

Full-stack Web Developer / Software Engineer

Projects

  • Maestro Playlist Creator

    React | NodeJS | Express | PostgreSQL | CSS | Sequelize

    Maestro utilizes Spotify's API to create playlists from recommendations based on your mood. It allows you to store the "moods" for later, and even save them directly to your Spotify account. Maestro was created with Camila Gonzalez, Emily Kanarek, and Parker Montgomery.

  • Mangrove Manor Mystery Game

    React | NodeJS | Express | PostgreSQL | CSS | Sequelize

    Mangrove Manor is a text-based mystery game inspired by the Choose Your Own Adventure book series. In the game, you'll explore an old house, collect clues, and try to solve the murder of Ms. Mangrove! It has a PostgreSQL database seeded with five unique suspects, and uses an Express API to fetch clues associated with each character to populate scenes throughout the story.

  • Disc Golf Bag Builder coming soon...

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
